lead_paragraph: Opposition lawmakers rejected the offer, calling it a ploy, and said they would call for a vote on Friday to impeach Ms. Park, who is embroiled in a corruption scandal.
snippet: Opposition lawmakers rejected the offer, calling it a ploy, and said they would call for a vote on Friday to impeach Ms. Park, who is embroiled in a corruption scandal....

headline.main: Park Geun-hye, Embattled South Korean President, Says She’s Willing to Resign
headline.print_headline: ‘I Am Giving Up Everything Now,’ South Korean President Says in Offer to Resign
